entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
